artist: Artist: Rev. Bronwyn Pandaemonium; Printer: Knust Press, Nijmegen, Netherlands
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, magenta and black image of a house roof and electric pole, with white text on black ground, on wove paper covers; 52 pp.
title: The Summer of Light and the Winter of Death
